nameSuffix: Following on from Weave vs Natural? The Politics of Afro Hair talk at 12pm
teaserText: Teaser description for event: Are you a budding young feminist? Would you use the F word in the playground? If so, we’ve got the perfect session for you.
description: Considering going natural but not sure how to go about it? Been natural for a while and need some new styling tips or inspiration? Join leading natural hair bloggers Crystal Afro (United KinKdom), Angel Dike (The Natural Lounge) and others as they guide you through the best products, salons and the difference between ACV and BC. All hair types welcome!
location: Level 4 Green Bar at Royal Festival Hall

festival.name: WOW - Women of the World
